Articles.Content:
HELLO GAMERS! this is Austin from the SGBU and I'm seeking out awesome mission ideas for my Kerbal Space Program series on my channel. I'm seeking entertaining challenges that I can get a viable 30 minute or less video out of with a maximum of 2 hour recording period. Thank you and I will be sure to credit your forum and/or YouTube name for your submission.

My Channel:

[https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCNvmmyfpsqWJt1x-vP_uoow](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCNvmmyfpsqWJt1x-vP_uoow)

You've come to the right place! I've got a few ideas for interesting mission for ya.

1. Do precision landing on the Mun, getting two spacecraft launched separately next to each other.

2. Do an orbital docking over Kerbin without RCS.

3. Do at least a fly-by of Eve (a feat in of itself!).

4. Land on top of one of the mountains west of the KSC.

Fly through all the nooks and crannies in the Space Center! (You wouldn't believe how tight some of those spaces are at 150 m/s... ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif))
